001/**
002 * This file reads the information necessary to connect to the database
003 * @author Shruti Oruganti
004 */
005package src.database;
006
007import java.io.IOException;
008import java.io.InputStream;
009import java.util.Properties;
010
011/**
012 * This class helps read the database information and stores the important properties of the database
013 */
014public final class db_setup  {
015  /**
016   * Variable representing the database username
017   */
018  public static final String user;
019  /**
020   * Variable representing the database password
021   */
022  public static final String pswd;
023  static {
024    Properties props = new Properties();
025    try (InputStream input = db_setup.class.getResourceAsStream("dbConfig.properties")) {
026        if (input == null) {
027            throw new IOException("Config file not found: " + "dbConfig.properties");
028        }
029        props.load(input);
030    } catch (IOException e) {
031        throw new RuntimeException("Error loading database config file", e);
032    }
033    user = props.getProperty("db.user");
034    pswd = props.getProperty("db.password");
035  }
036}
